channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: What Separates the Top PGA Tour Players from the Rest of the Field
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando This article identifies what separates the top PGA Tour players from the rest of the competition using H2O and LIME. The article and visualizations were produced using Tableau Public and the predictions and explainable machine learning techniques were performed in R. Click here for the full article.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
